data.title: DWR Releases First Assessments of Initial Groundwater Sustainability Plans
data.excerpt: The California Department of Water Resources (DWR) released its first assessments of groundwater sustainability plans developed by local agencies to meet the requirements of the Sustainable Groundwater Management Act (SGMA).
data.author: Chach Sikes
